text: Heartfire (1998) is an alternate history and fantasy book that was written by Orson Scott Card. It is the fifth book in Card's The Tales of Alvin Maker series and is about Alvin Miller, the seventh son of a seventh son, which gives him magical powers. ==Other websites== * About the novel Heartfire from Card's website Category:1998 books Category:The Tales of Alvin Maker
